reviews.review: Una obra maestra. La historia que han creado es increíble y desde el principio te engancha.
通常来说，做出了非常优秀的游戏，续作一般很难超越，尤其是前作如此高评价，传送门2在这样的情况下，成功超越了第一作，简直不能更牛逼了。神作经典的升华，必玩啊必玩啊，不过这作好像继续引擎的老毛病，容易晕眩，我只能遗憾了，不过能玩的话，这是必玩的游戏，非常推荐。联机模式的设计非常赞，不需要说话！尽量简单的互相指示，默契达成的时候感觉真是太棒了。
If you like solving puzzles, then this game is for you. You wont be able to stop playing it. Awesome story.
It's, like, the sequel to Portal... If you haven't played it then play it now. Seriously.
is gud

[h1][b]「おかえりなさい、テストの時間です」[/b][/h1]

前作のシステムは変わらず、新しく反発ジェルという要素が加わり
難解なパズルになって帰ってきた。

ストーリーは前作終了後のお話、主人公はおしゃべりな人格コア「Wheatley」によって起こされ
再びテストチェンバーに舞い戻る事に…
今度こそ主人公は脱出する事は出来るのだろうか？
と、前作よりも臨場感あるストーリー展開になっている
前作をやっていればより楽しめるが、すっとばして遊んでも良い
誰もが認める最高のパズルアクションゲーム
とにかく見るよりも触れてみるのが一番である

貴方は最後まで投げ出さず
主人公に外の景色を見せることが出来るだろうか？

パズルを解いて、愛を知れ！

Great game! The singleplayer is very captivating and has a good and fun story. Eventho I very rarely play singleplayer I fint it very difficult to stop with this game - it's just so well written and executed that you just have to keep playing! Co-op is great fun too.
the game was all around fantastic it had everything i would have whanted from a puzzle game, also it was in first pirson and it hade co-op. Amazing!
Get the game, fun puzzle platformer, not required to play the first Portal because the story is not too tied in. The steam workshop adds a lot post-game.

Portal 2 is one of my favourite games of all time. I like the way you have to think everytime to complete a level. I loved the story which was more complicated than the story of the original Portal. I learned many information for aperture laborotories and LEMONS(if you know what i mean). I would reccomend this game to everyone.

It has amazing Portal physics, and in some parts in the single player it leaves you with a sense of vertigo because of it.
Over all it is a highly competent puzzle game that incorporates the first person aspect of it well!
GG
This game is truely brilliant. It makes you think and that thinking is fun! It has many hours of good gameplay and with the steam workshop being active, there are countless hours of fun!
sin palabras... hermoso juegazo!

Шедевр!!!
Такого геймплея нет нигде можно сказать. Он очень интересный. Отдельно отмечу режим испытаний. Он очень крут. Они на количество порталов, на время и на количество шагов. Очень сложно пройти на золото но советую всем это сделать. Это запомнится на долго. Ну даже если просто их пройти будет очень круто. Всем рекомендую!!!

Portal 2...well what can you say that is bad about the game...???

Continuing Portal this game just gets more intricate with the puzzles, level design, and of course the very dark humour and fucked up universe that Aperture Laboratories is part of. Besides being little wierd in its lore...

...the game is just fun and if you enjoy the games that Valve puts out and they definitely do a good job at it...maybe with some extended breaks in between...then your all set to enjoy this.

Bardzo ciekawa i wytężająca umysł gra! Nie jest to tylko zbiór łamigłówek, które należy przejść, lecz historia, której kolejne karty odkrywamy przechodząc coraz to trudniejsze wyzwania. Dzięki wykorzystaniu laserów, działek, mostów świetlnych, katapult, żeli i innych utrudnień gra naprawdę sie nie nudzi, a ekscytujący (i dość niespoedziewany) finał jest warty każdej spędzonej z grą minuty. Kolejnym plusem jest to, że na singlu świat się nie kończy. Jest tu multiplayer (i to w dodatku z opcją split-screen, co jest obecnie rzadkością!!), który przedłuża zabawę o prawie drugie tyle, co kampania (a nawet więcej, biorąc pod uwagę poziom trudności niektórych zagadek). To wszystko dopełniają mapy z Workshop, które pokazują, co użytkownicy Potala mają pod kopułą. Polecam, 10/10! Niech tylko bedzie trójka...
Классная игра.
An excellent puzzle game. Great puzzles, setting and humor. Definitely on the easier side. Highly recommended if you want to enjoy some casual puzzle-solving.

Glados, best inspirational speaker. I remember a line from her that changed my life forever.
"Hey, Moron!"
Oh yeah, and CaveJohnson4Prez 1O/1O

Awesome game! Very challenging as sometimes it's not obviou how to advance on a stage. You really need to pay attention to the scenario and think what to do.

The game is also very humorous and can make you get a good amount of laughs.

The graphics are amazing. I'm impressed that I can run at full quality on a Linux laptop with Intel integrated graphics.

Totally recommended!!!

Basically, Portal.
But longer, better, faster, more addictive.
And not to mention, Wheatley. Best core you'll ever came to know.

And yea, you still get to date companion cube!

10/10 would teleport again.
Más divertido aún que la primera entrega. Muy original y para todos los gustos.
This game is absolutely wonderful. I am awful at video games, however this game focuses more on puzzle solving than gaming skill. The storyline is great and doesn't get monotonous.

Gra, które różni się od innych FPS-ów - i to bardzo. Nie jest to shooter, który stawia na efektowne wybuchy, pościgi, strzelaniny. Tu się strzela portalami. Świetna gra na uruchomienie choć kilku szarych komórek i włączenia logicznego myślenia aby przechodzić kolejne pomieszczenia testowe grając w single player, kooperację lub przechodząc mapy stworzone przez społeczność. Portal 2 z pewnością sprostał wymaganiom prequela i zachęcam was do kupna tej gry. Jeśli grałeś w pierwszą część - kup. Jeśli nie grałeś w żadną po prostu kup obydwie i ciesz się z nietypowej gry, która z pewnością odciągnie cie od powszechnych wrażeń tytułów z widokiem pierwszoosobowym wraz ze świetnym soundtrackiem.
GET IT!
Excelente jogo, mistura estrátegia e humor. Em coop é ainda mais divertido. Ótimas fases, a meu ver só tem pontos positivos.

this is a good game you should defintly get it you can create chambers witch is something i like and the story is epic espesscaily twhen glados wakes up because of portal.....1. The Portal 2 story really fits in with the Portal 1 story line but it leaves you wanting to know more. like Where did wheatly come from, Does chell ever get captured AGAIN. HOW DID CHELL GET CAPTURED AFTER ESCAPING THE FIRST TIME. i got my ideas on that one, Fake Hotel Room. LOL but if they ever come out with a Portal 3 I WILL GET IT and YOU SHOULD TO
Portal 2 is a great game.  Highly reccomend it to all.

Great game, the story is priceless. I just love it!

The original was good, and the sequel improves and expands on it in every way.

Such Fun So Wow

I cant express in words how amaze
perfected version of the first Portal game, with loads of detail, harder puzzles, better and longer story and a fun coop mode,
The BEST!
Worth
Excellent puzzler.
The Co-op was great. It gets very interesting when you have 4 portals.

Ahhh portal. If your like me, it's the puzzle based physics game that you thought you wouldn't like but couldn't put down when you first tried it out. 

The AI throws snarky wit at you at every turn and will take every chance she gets to sarcastically remind you of your unfortunate fate. The puzzles begin easy and work their way up in difficulty by introducing new twists and turns as well as new objects or enemies. Without giving away too much, buy this game and watch yourself get lost for hours.
Innovative

A mind blowing adventures, with hours of puzzle solving fun. If you like flying through the air with the greatest of ease, this game is for you! The NewYorker gave it 5 stars out of 2. Even my grandma likes it.

Portal/Portal 2 для меня - это открытие года. Я вообще не слоупок, просто с 2008 года немного заигрался в разные MMORPG.
Эта игра оторвала меня от привычного игрового уклада - просидел прошлые выходные в Portal,  в эти выходные начал Portal 2.
Что привлекает? Необычная концепция порталов, когда можно даже впасть в рекурсию %). Именно эта концепция придает обычным головоломкам с кнопками и кубиками свежесть морозного дыхания :D. В связи с этим появляются необычные, по первому разу, решения. Радует расширяемость игры selfmade головоломками.
Приобрел и играю с удовольствием.
Можно с другом погамать, и голову поломать, 10/10

Portal 2 is an awesome game.  It takes everything great from Portal 1 and adds so much more content, and even some backstory, to make it a must get game.

I can't wait for Portal 3... Oh, right, that probably won't happen.
정말... 이걸 사기 위해서 내가 스팀을 깔았지.

mac版レビューです。
テキストが全て表示されない・・・。それにより、言語の設定を日本語にする事も出来ない。
One of the best games of all time!! Briliant story, fantastic co-op. There should be no second thought for this game!! IT'S A MUST HAVE!!

Probabilmente il mio gioco preferito di sempre, riesce ad unire due aspetti che adoro quali il puzzle solving e la narrazione in maniera a dir poco perfetta: pur avendolo comprato per i sui "enigmi", mi sono presto trovato affascinato dai suoi personaggio, tutti ottimamente caratterizzati, con i loro obbiettivi e la loro visione dello strano mondo che li circonda. Per chiunque avesse finito questo capolavoro e non lo sapesse, c'è una mod, "portal stories MEL" che è un must play per qualsiasi appassionato.
I love this game, I thought it was a great continuation to the Portal story. The workshop content makes it constantly new and fresh. Highly recommend to anyone that likes puzzles.
I love this game, definitely recommend it. One of the best stories in gaming.
New Creepy intro!  10/10

Non c'è neanche da parlarne. Seguito di un capolavoro, realizzato con testa e passione. Il gioco è più longevo, presenta il multiplayer e soprattutto è pieno zeppo di frasi divertenti, bei posticini caratteristici (rispetto al primo, ovvio) e dello scervellamento classico della serie. Consigliatissimo, davvero.
Its my game and i love this!
Excelent game.  The puzzels were fun while also being challenging and the story line was eventful and entertaining.
Me surpreendi bastante, pensei que não iam conseguir fazer um jogo tão bom quanto o primeiro mas conseguiram. Recomendado. 10/10
Recomiendo este juego ya que las horas que le he echado han sido invertidas buenamente y su jugabilidad es perfecta.
Absolutely AMAZING and funny :)

Muy recomendado este juego. Entretenido, más largo que su primera parte, y que no lo dejarás hasta llegar al final. También la idea de los portales me ha parecido original, algo nunca visto en videojuegos hasta donde yo sé.
ストーリーのあるPortal。パズルにも新要素が出て良い感じ。惜しむらくはタレットとコンパニオンキューブの出番が少ないこと。

I thought that Portal would be incredibly hard to beat and that Portal 2 couldn't be any better. I was wrong. Portal 2 is a fantastic follow-up to the first game and you should honestly buy it as soon as possible. The characters are interesting, the plot itself is very unique and just...

please buy it.
